summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue, from Yesler Way to East Olive Street, and East Olive Street, from Twenty-first Avenue to East Madison Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing brick gutters, concrete curbs with granite corners, in accordance with Resolution No. 353 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
